files.name: CONTRIBUTING.md
files.content:
You might want to check out [this medium article](https://codeburst.io/magic-grid-f8e2221e7cef) before jumping in. Once You're ready to go: - Create a fork
- make your changes
- add tests where applicable
- open a pr on dev branch
